item.title: VMware vRealize SaltStack Config API
item.description: Using SaltStack Config api for Automation from vRA Catalog or cmd A personal goal of mine for 2022 was to start doing more with Python when working with VMware SaltStack Config.

item.title: Raspberry PI Powered Clay Thrower
item.description: Raspberry PI Powered Clay Thrower Link to my Raspberry PI powered Clay Thrower. The first project I ever did with a PI.
